text:
MNX Solutions | Monroe, MI | https://www.mnxsolutions.com | ONSITE

MNX Solutions is a server management and cloud hosting provider (https://mnx.io). We are looking for an experienced Linux admin to join our team.

Please reach out and introduce yourself via email to hr@mnxsolutions.com and reference this posting.

Additional information at https://www.mnxsolutions.com/jobs
